title: Spark: The best telebot for friend grps!
description: Hey, I'm Sparkk 🌟 and I'm the hot new bombshell entering your Telegram group chats with your friends! Here's what I do: 1️⃣ Send regular prompts to your group chats 2️⃣ Prompts are sent at random times 3️⃣ Themes and frequency of prompts are customisable!
